attributes.action: Protect the Greenfield sites we have left!
attributes.additional_details:
Rebuild these bridges by doing the best thing they can by putting proposals of laws to stop any more building on the green field sites we have left. There are plenty of brownfield sites we can use instead ruining the countryside for our selfishness.
Especially after Brexit happens we will need as many fields as possible and farms to produce the materials we need. And communities have been ripped apart. For example, small villages with a shop and houses not many. The communities feel they no longer belong to one.
attributes.background: For too long the UK government has taken advantage over our rural areas and the small communities over the years. And there’s demonstrations what goes on but what happens they get removed or arrested. It’s like we are not being listened to. Like I said the UK government and Parliament needs to
